items.description: Money wouldn't exist if it wasn't meant to be spent. They are more likely to spend money when they shouldn't.
Who doesn't want to be liked? They avidly avoid hurting or upsetting others.
Doesn't take much for them to choose the violent option.
Some would say you're driven, others say obsessed.
Work or don't work; that is the question. Answer: don't.
They like to kill people, needn't say more.
They love to go out and find ways to improve their lives.
It is very important to be neat, they really need that to be the case.
They're very talented at fixing, making and...well crafting.
Who doesn't like a bit of food? In this case they love food.
